mdRecord.dcterms:title: Surgical stitching instrument
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Singer Sewing Machine Company [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Singer Surgical Stitching Instrument, World Wide Service, Model A-3, Made in U.S.A. Instrument in leather case; kit also includes thread wheels, wire brush, attachment tool, and curved needles of varying sizes. Leather case contained in cardboard box.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus
